Languages.Language 1: Understands the languages of its creator but can not speak

Equipment Actions.Action 1: Slam, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 13 Bludgeoning

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Golem makes 2 Slam attacks

Abilities.Ability 1: Berserk, When the Golem has sustained enough damage, it begins to go berserk, attacking whichever creature is closest to it
Abilities.Ability 2: Aversion of Fire, The Golem retains the fear of fire of all living flesh, having disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks after taking any Fire damage
Abilities.Ability 3: Immutable Form, The Golem is immune to spells that would alter its form
Abilities.Ability 4: Lightning Absorption, The Golem absorbs lightning damage and heals from it
Abilities.Ability 5: Magic Resistance, The Golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects
Abilities.Ability 6: Magic Weapons, The Golem's weapon attacks are magical

Damage Immunities.Damage 3: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with Adamantine weapons
